lead_paragraph: So what if coach Steve Kerr added a pair of extra turnovers to his team's ugly, uncharacteristic two-day total? He made his point that the Golden State Warriors' sloppy play of late must stop, well before the playoffs begin as the record-setting NBA champions chase another title.

headline.print_headline: Steve Kerr Calls for Warriors to Clean Up Turnovers, Defense
headline.main: Steve Kerr Calls for Warriors to Clean Up Turnovers, Defense
